content: small doll abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain tch = turning chain decrease = decrease stitch body round 1 make a magic loop chain 2 and single_crochet 5 in magic loop slip_stitch in last stitch of row in the chain 2 6 round 2 chain 2 increase x 5 single_crochet slip_stitch in last stitch of row 12 round 3 chain 2 single_crochet increase x 5 single_crochet slip_stitch in last stitch of row 18 round 4 chain 2 single_crochet x 17 slip_stitch in last stitch of row 18 round 5 chain 2 single_crochet decrease x 5 decrease slip_stitch in last stitch of row 12 round 6 chain 2 single_crochet x 11 slip_stitch in last stitch of row 12 insert safety eyes between row 4 and 5 round 7 chain 2 decrease x 5 slip_stitch in last stitch of row 6 round 8 chain 2 increase x 5 single_crochet slip_stitch in last stitch of row 12 rnds 9-11 chain 2 single_crochet x 11 slip_stitch in last stitch of row 12 round 12 chain 2 decrease x 5 slip_stitch in last stitch of row 6 fasten_off arm make two round 1 slip_stitch into body on round 8 chain 3 tch round 2 in first stitch do 4 single_crochet do 1 single_crochet in other 3 stitches slip_stitch into body leg make two round 1 slip_stitch into body on round 8 chain 3 tch round 2 in first stitch do 3 single_crochet do 1 single_crochet in other 3 stitches slip_stitch into body hair slip_stitch onto head where you want hair to go attach yarn to slsts to create hair
